>-=SUDIE=-
>
>"What was that.  I didn't think anybody else was on this planet.  Bot
>mode"  He transformed into a bot.  The bots face was black with a
>yellow face piece, green eyes, and a yellow skull cap.  His body was
>black and the bot had black feathers flowing from his arms.  His
>fingers were yellow.  He was carrying two Black repeating laser
>blaster with a sprialing yellow running up the blasters.  His body was
>black with a Yellow Thigh and Pelvis Plate.  His leg were black with
>Yellow Boots. The bot started to look around for a bot.

Fade in from the new yellow robot staring around armed and ready. Yet there
is nothing to see, then out of nowhere come the melodic hum.

COMPUTER: "Require assistances at this location, preadacon base, unit down
and severly damage, over"

Then a readout of the location downloads itself
